name: Chris Guzman
bio: Chris Guzman is an Android developer and recovering Rails developer. He co-organizes GDG New Orleans. A recent transplant from Baltimore, he loves board games and all types of comedy.

name: Sia Karamalegos
bio: Sia Karamalegos is the founder and lead developer for Clio + Calliope. She is a Google Developer Expert in Web Technologies, a Women Techmakers ambassador, and a co-organizer of GDG New Orleans.

name: Olivia Sabo-Rush
bio: Liv is a New Orleans based software engineer. She co-organizes GDG New Orleans and #FrontEndParty, and has a passion for UI/UX.
